Class Ingredient

java.lang.Object
greenfoot.Actor
Ingredient
public class Ingredient extends greenfoot.Actor
This is the base class for an Ingredient. It takes different images on construction, depenting on what kind of ingredient it is. All ingredients will have a number, name, image, and the number of chops that are required to prepare them. The isPrepared attribute will determine whether the ingredient is ready to be used to make the meal yet or not.

(a version number or a date)
